result.execSummary:
Cliffton Jerome Spencer was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Cliffton Jerome Spencer was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cliffton Jerome Spencer

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant has been turned over to the State of Illinois.  On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: bvj 
Court was advised that the defendant is currently being held in the House of Corrections with a good time release date of 8/21/2015. Status conference will be held on 8/31/2015.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in court with attorney Richard Jeffrey Carpenter.  Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.
Status Conference held.  Defendant has pending case.  Remand to continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in court with attorney Alexis Liggins.  Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Status Conference held.  Defendant has pending case.  Remand to continue.  Status conference scheduled for May 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Cliffton Jerome Spencer in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Pocan, Branch 26.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
